name: Archaeologist Organizer
description:
This was made for the RPI October 2017 24-hour game jam. The themes were: put it back together, dinosaur, and a few others that I don't remember.

This game is still in its submission state. As such, avoid releasing boxes near the peak of your jump. This may cause the game to freeze permanently.

Controls: WASD to move around. Press j to pick up or throw a box. Holding s and pressing j will pick up a box below you or place a held box gently at your feet. Pressing s will also drop you through thin platforms. Press r to restart a level if you mess up.
